title: NXP and Broadcom Are 2 Chip Stocks to Buy for Next Year, Analyst Says
text:
NXP and Broadcom Are 2 Chip Stocks to Buy for Next Year, Analyst Says

Text size

Photograph by Chris Ried

There are buying opportunities in the semiconductor industry, even amid the current uncertainty over tariffs and slowing global economies, Bernstein analyst Stacy Rasgon says.

“It is possible that some investors may be starting to look forward to a 2020 time frame, and attempting to build a case that it can (hopefully) be better, with (in theory) potential for easier compares,” he wrote on Wednesday.
description: Bernstein analyst Stacy Rasgon reiterated his Outperform ratings for NXP Semiconductors and Broadcom shares. He has price targets of $125 and $340, respectively, for the two chip stocks.
